author.name: Artyom Anpilogov
page.index.title: AnpilogovPW — Frontend Developer Creating Clear and Fast Interfaces
page.index.description: My name is Artyom Anpilogov. I specialize in building fast, user-friendly, and maintainable web applications using modern technologies. My work combines an engineering mindset with attention to interface details to make products both reliable inside and simple for users outside.
page.contacts.title: Contacts — Get in Touch with Artyom Anpilogov
page.contacts.description: Contact me to discuss a project or potential collaboration. Telegram or email — I’m always open to professional communication.
page.blog.title: Blog — Development Without Fluff | AnpilogovPW
page.blog.description: Sharing my frontend development experience: architecture decisions, optimization, and nuances of Vue, React, and TypeScript. Honest and to the point.

page.privacy.description: How this website collects, uses, and protects user data. Transparent and law-compliant.
